articles.author: Drew Harwell
articles.title: Trump and Xi bless long-awaited deal to spin off U.S. TikTok - The Washington Post
articles.description: An American version of the popular app will be partially owned by a consortium of Trump-allied investors, people familiar with the deal said, sidestepping a legally mandated ban the president has repeatedly pushed off.
